cause.description:
As the interest in Jazz diminishes, so too does the funding for Jazz radio stations, Jazz clubs and other organizations. Showing interest and making donations to the cause will help to keep Jazz alive and strong for the people who enjoy it.
Users are also encouraged to donate, or download the stream of Jazz FM.91, a Toronto based Jazz station with excellent standards.
Download and even donate at www.jazz.fm
Some notable jazz musicians (message me for other suggestions)
John Coltrane Miles Davis Billie Holiday Ella Fitzgerald Wynton Marsalis Keith Jarrett Glenn Miller Quincy Jones Vince Guaraldi Dizzy Gillsepie Herbie Hancock Clark Terry Quintet Mike Jones George Shearing Nancy Wilson Harry Connick Jr. Michael Bublé Frank Sinatra Astrud Gilberto Oscar Peterson Monty Alexander Ray Brown Max Roach Stan Getz Art pepper
1. People who enjoy the genre should always be allowed to listen to it on the radio.
2. Musicians should always have Jazz venues to perform at.
3. Young people should be given the opportunity to lern the style as well as the history of it.
cause.mission: Help to make sure jazz is broadcast on the radio as the interest for this unique genre sadly diminishes.
cause.name: Keep Jazz on the Air, Encourage Jazz Education
